name: shared-kinesis-stream
description: Sharing an AWS Kinesis stream across multiple Serverless stacks

scripts.install: cd core && npm i cd ../producer-service && npm i && cd ../consumer-service && npm i & cd ..
scripts.deploy: cd core && echo Deploying Core && sls deploy -v && cd ../producer-service && echo Deploying Produce Service && sls deploy -v && cd ../consumer-service && echo Deploying Consumer Service && sls deploy -v && cd ..
scripts.remove: cd consumer-service && echo Removing Consumer Service && sls remove -v && cd ../producer-service && echo Removing Producer Service && sls remove -v && cd ../core && echo Removing Core && sls remove -v && cd ..

author: Jason Ody
